original_title: Die Widerständigen - Zeugen der Weißen Rose
overview: This is the first comprehensive documentary portrayal of the White Rose, the movement led by Munich students and their spirit of resistance to the Nazi regime. Companions, girlfriends, brothers and sisters tell the story of how they supported the distribution of tracts, how they survived Gestapo interrogation and courtroom trials in the Nazis’ Volksgerichtshof.
title: Die Widerständigen - Zeugen der Weißen Rose
